title: ABOUT
description: I am currently a software engineer/data engineer located in San Jose, CA.
paragraphe1: I'm passionate about working with data to draw conclusions about the world and .
paragraphes: Excluding professional work, I love learning about mathematics and philosophy in my free time. My areas of interest include mathematical logic, algebraic topology, and philosophy of language. Although I certifiably am not an expert in any of these topics, you can find some of my thoughts, rants, and musings in my [blog](#).
